name: Cream of Broccoli Soup

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or Epicure dip mix of your choice

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, melt butter over medium heat, sauté onion until soft, 3 minutes.
Slowly whisk in milk. Bring to a slow boil whisking constantly, until sauce has thickened.
Whisk in broccoli purée and dip mix. Simmer for 5 more minutes.
tips: To make this recipe super-fast, steam broccoli in an Epicure steamer for 2–3 minutes.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 serving protein and 1 serving grain/starch.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
